name: Ka Widyaa
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
text1: I want to take you to FIP's birthday AKA Cakra event :D
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: kak widya sibuk gaa? aku liat liat si main guest star di cakra ada for revenge.. andd kayanya bakal seru dehh kalau kita nonton bareng..
outroText: SOOOO LET ME KNOW YA KALAU KA WIDYA BERKENAN
replayText: atau kalau ka widya mau ngulang baca dari awal bisa klik tombol ini :P
